Description: The subject and scope of this tender is the conclusion of three framework agreements for ecological upgrading and climate adaptation within the residential areas of properties in the city of Zurich. These ecological upgrades and climate adaptations take place as part of the urban green program. The Urban Green Program includes Program 3 - Promotion of heat-reducing measures for self-owned businesses on properties in the city of Zurich. The services include in particular gardening work, earthworks, Foundations, surfacing work (surfacing, asphalt, concrete blocks and gravel), as well as greenery, tree planting and the associated care during the first two (optionally five) years.
